channel.title: I need help with something very basic plz answer fast1! ty
channel.description:
hello guy i just want to know ... when i download a client like this one http://rs-sources.co.cc/showthread.php?208-Client-Version-Download-(Auto-Download-Cache) ...... what i do afther it's download ????? i do extract file /to desktop and afther that? when i click play now it say / could not find the main class :client program will exit plz i need help i want to play this server but how i do thx a lot
cradle143
maybe i'm not in the good board sorry ..... :S PLZZZZZZZZZZZ ANSWER I NEED HELP PLZ

item.title: I need help with something very basic plz answer fast1! ty
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

Well, you’ll need to set your paths (assuming you haven’t…) so you would need to go to environment variables and set:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin

As path, only with your version of JDK in the top box. Then under that add:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin

In the box below and set that as your classpath.

I’m not sure if that will fix it… But I’m just throwing it out.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with something very basic plz answer fast1! ty
